query:
双环体系（norbornane、norbornene、norbornadiene）在两种3D构象方法（ETKDGv3、ETKDG；力场MMFF）下的单一低能构象数据如下（Rg：Å；能量：kcal/mol；PMI1/PMI3、Eccentricity：无量纲）：
- ETKDGv3：
  • norbornane: Rg=2.08, PMI1/PMI3=0.42, Eccentricity=0.63, Energy=48.72
  • norbornene: Rg=2.05, PMI1/PMI3=0.44, Eccentricity=0.66, Energy=50.15
  • norbornadiene: Rg=2.02, PMI1/PMI3=0.46, Eccentricity=0.69, Energy=52.03
- ETKDG：
  • norbornane: Rg=2.10, PMI1/PMI3=0.41, Eccentricity=0.62, Energy=49.36
  • norbornene: Rg=2.07, PMI1/PMI3=0.43, Eccentricity=0.65, Energy=50.92
  • norbornadiene: Rg=2.04, PMI1/PMI3=0.45, Eccentricity=0.68, Energy=52.81
给定刚性指数公式：RI = (1/Rg) × (PMI1/PMI3) × (1 + Eccentricity) × 100。定义方法平均值：RI_avg(method) = (RI_norbornane + RI_norbornene + RI_norbornadiene)/3。
一致性阈值：能量=2.0%，RI=5.0%，方法平均值=5.0%。百分比差均以ETKDGv3为基准：
- 单分子能量差(%) = |E_v3 − E_etkdg| / E_v3 × 100；
- 单分子RI差(%) = |RI_v3 − RI_etkdg| / RI_v3 × 100；
- 方法平均值差(%) = |RI_avg_v3 − RI_avg_etkdg| / RI_avg_v3 × 100。
判定：若两方法RI_avg的相对百分比差≤5.0%，取ETKDGv3为最终基准法；否则取两方法简单平均为最终结果。
任务：
(1) 计算并报告三种分子在两方法下的RI（逐分子）及各方法的RI_avg。
(2) 报告单分子能量百分比差与RI百分比差，并标记是否在各自阈值内。
(3) 报告两方法RI_avg的百分比差与阈值判定；据此给出最终RI_avg_final及采用的方法。
(4) 提供质检用文件路径（字符串）：
  • norbornane: ./qc_assets/2d/norbornane.png; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornane_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornane_conf0.xyz; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornane_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornane_conf0.xyz
  • norbornene: ./qc_assets/2d/norbornene.png; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornene_conf0.xyz; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornene_conf0.xyz
  • norbornadiene: ./qc_assets/2d/norbornadiene.png; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornadiene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornadiene_conf0.xyz; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornadiene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornadiene_conf0.xyz
结果以数值表达，统一保留两位小数。

metadata.subject: 化学科学
solution_steps: 定义三种[2.2.1]双环体系的SMILES结构：norbornane (C1CC2CCC1C2), norbornene (C1CC2C=CC1C2), norbornadiene (C1=CC2C=CC1C2)
调用 chem_visualizer 生成三个分子的2D和3D可视化图像
对每个分子调用 optimize_geometry(smiles, method='ETKDGv3', force_field='MMFF', max_iters=200) 进行能量优化
对每个分子调用 get_3d_properties(smiles, method='ETKDGv3', conf_id=0) 计算3D性质
提取 Rg, PMI1, PMI3, eccentricity，计算刚性指数 RI = (1/Rg) × (PMI1/PMI3) × (1 + eccentricity) × 100
获取三个分子的RI：norbornane=81.58, norbornene=81.39, norbornadiene=84.50

function.name: chem_visualizer
function.description: 分子可视化工具，支持批量生成分子的2D结构图和3D结构图。直接生成图片文件到当前目录。

molecules.description: 分子列表，每个元素包含分子名称和对应的SMILES字符串。例如: [{'name': 'ethanol', 'smiles': 'CCO'}, {'name': 'benzene', 'smiles': 'c1ccccc1'}]

function.name: optimize_geometry
function.description: 分子几何优化工具（能量最小化）。基于分子力场进行能量最小化，优化分子的三维几何构型。

smiles.description: 分子的SMILES表示字符串，或化学名称（会自动转换），例如: 'CCO', 'c1ccccc1', 'aspirin'

method.description: 3D坐标生成方法：'ETKDG'（标准ETKDG方法）、'ETKDGv3'（改进的ETKDGv3方法，推荐）、'basic'（基本嵌入方法）

force_field.description: 力场类型，默认为'MMFF'。'MMFF'：MMFF94力场，适用于大多数有机分子，精度较高；'UFF'：通用力场，适用范围更广但精度稍低

max_iters.description: 能量最小化的最大迭代次数，默认200次

function.name: get_3d_properties
function.description: 计算分子的3D几何性质和形状描述符。基于主惯性矩分析分子的三维形状特征。

smiles.description: 分子的SMILES表示字符串，或化学名称（会自动转换），例如: 'CCO', 'c1ccccc1', 'aspirin'

method.description: 3D坐标生成方法：'ETKDG'（标准ETKDG方法）、'ETKDGv3'（改进的ETKDGv3方法，推荐）、'basic'（基本嵌入方法）

conf_id.description: 构象ID，默认为0（第一个构象）

一致性阈值：能量=2.0%，RI=5.0%，方法平均值=5.0%。百分比差均以ETKDGv3为基准：

- 方法平均值差(%) = |RI_avg_v3 − RI_avg_etkdg| / RI_avg_v3 × 100。

messages.content:
双环体系（norbornane、norbornene、norbornadiene）在两种3D构象方法（ETKDGv3、ETKDG；力场MMFF）下的单一低能构象数据如下（Rg：Å；能量：kcal/mol；PMI1/PMI3、Eccentricity：无量纲）：
- ETKDGv3：
  • norbornane: Rg=2.08, PMI1/PMI3=0.42, Eccentricity=0.63, Energy=48.72
  • norbornene: Rg=2.05, PMI1/PMI3=0.44, Eccentricity=0.66, Energy=50.15
  • norbornadiene: Rg=2.02, PMI1/PMI3=0.46, Eccentricity=0.69, Energy=52.03
- ETKDG：
  • norbornane: Rg=2.10, PMI1/PMI3=0.41, Eccentricity=0.62, Energy=49.36
  • norbornene: Rg=2.07, PMI1/PMI3=0.43, Eccentricity=0.65, Energy=50.92
  • norbornadiene: Rg=2.04, PMI1/PMI3=0.45, Eccentricity=0.68, Energy=52.81
给定刚性指数公式：RI = (1/Rg) × (PMI1/PMI3) × (1 + Eccentricity) × 100。定义方法平均值：RI_avg(method) = (RI_norbornane + RI_norbornene + RI_norbornadiene)/3。
一致性阈值：能量=2.0%，RI=5.0%，方法平均值=5.0%。百分比差均以ETKDGv3为基准：
- 单分子能量差(%) = |E_v3 − E_etkdg| / E_v3 × 100；
- 单分子RI差(%) = |RI_v3 − RI_etkdg| / RI_v3 × 100；
- 方法平均值差(%) = |RI_avg_v3 − RI_avg_etkdg| / RI_avg_v3 × 100。
判定：若两方法RI_avg的相对百分比差≤5.0%，取ETKDGv3为最终基准法；否则取两方法简单平均为最终结果。
任务：
(1) 计算并报告三种分子在两方法下的RI（逐分子）及各方法的RI_avg。
(2) 报告单分子能量百分比差与RI百分比差，并标记是否在各自阈值内。
(3) 报告两方法RI_avg的百分比差与阈值判定；据此给出最终RI_avg_final及采用的方法。
(4) 提供质检用文件路径（字符串）：
  • norbornane: ./qc_assets/2d/norbornane.png; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornane_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornane_conf0.xyz; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornane_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornane_conf0.xyz
  • norbornene: ./qc_assets/2d/norbornene.png; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornene_conf0.xyz; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornene_conf0.xyz
  • norbornadiene: ./qc_assets/2d/norbornadiene.png; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornadiene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornadiene_conf0.xyz; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornadiene_conf0.sdf; ./qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornadiene_conf0.xyz
结果以数值表达，统一保留两位小数。

```python
import pandas as pd

# 数据输入
data = {
    'ETKDGv3': {
        'norbornane': {'Rg': 2.08, 'PMI1/PMI3': 0.42, 'Eccentricity': 0.63, 'Energy': 48.72},
        'norbornene': {'Rg': 2.05, 'PMI1/PMI3': 0.44, 'Eccentricity': 0.66, 'Energy': 50.15},
        'norbornadiene': {'Rg': 2.02, 'PMI1/PMI3': 0.46, 'Eccentricity': 0.69, 'Energy': 52.03}
    },
    'ETKDG': {
        'norbornane': {'Rg': 2.10, 'PMI1/PMI3': 0.41, 'Eccentricity': 0.62, 'Energy': 49.36},
        'norbornene': {'Rg': 2.07, 'PMI1/PMI3': 0.43, 'Eccentricity': 0.65, 'Energy': 50.92},
        'norbornadiene': {'Rg': 2.04, 'PMI1/PMI3': 0.45, 'Eccentricity': 0.68, 'Energy': 52.81}
    }
}

# 刚性指数公式
def calculate_ri(Rg, PMI1_PMI3, Eccentricity):
    return (1 / Rg) * (PMI1_PMI3) * (1 + Eccentricity) * 100

# 一致性阈值
energy_threshold = 2.0
ri_threshold = 5.0
ri_avg_threshold = 5.0

# 计算RI和RI_avg
results = {}
for method in data:
    results[method] = {}
    ri_values = []
    for molecule in data[method]:
        Rg = data[method][molecule]['Rg']
        PMI1_PMI3 = data[method][molecule]['PMI1/PMI3']
        Eccentricity = data[method][molecule]['Eccentricity']
        ri = calculate_ri(Rg, PMI1_PMI3, Eccentricity)
        results[method][molecule] = {'RI': ri}
        ri_values.append(ri)
    results[method]['RI_avg'] = sum(ri_values) / 3

# 百分比差计算
for molecule in data['ETKDGv3']:
    E_v3 = data['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['Energy']
    E_etkdg = data['ETKDG'][molecule]['Energy']
    RI_v3 = results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['RI']
    RI_etkdg = results['ETKDG'][molecule]['RI']

    energy_diff_percent = abs(E_v3 - E_etkdg) / E_v3 * 100
    ri_diff_percent = abs(RI_v3 - RI_etkdg) / RI_v3 * 100

    results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['energy_diff_percent'] = energy_diff_percent
    results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['ri_diff_percent'] = ri_diff_percent
    results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['energy_within_threshold'] = energy_diff_percent <= energy_threshold
    results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['ri_within_threshold'] = ri_diff_percent <= ri_threshold

# 方法平均值差计算
RI_avg_v3 = results['ETKDGv3']['RI_avg']
RI_avg_etkdg = results['ETKDG']['RI_avg']
ri_avg_diff_percent = abs(RI_avg_v3 - RI_avg_etkdg) / RI_avg_v3 * 100
ri_avg_within_threshold = ri_avg_diff_percent <= ri_avg_threshold

# 最终RI_avg确定
if ri_avg_within_threshold:
    RI_avg_final = RI_avg_v3
    final_method = 'ETKDGv3'
else:
    RI_avg_final = (RI_avg_v3 + RI_avg_etkdg) / 2
    final_method = 'Average'

# 质检用文件路径
qc_assets = {
    'norbornane': {
        '2d': './qc_assets/2d/norbornane.png',
        '3d_etkdgv3_sdf': './qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornane_conf0.sdf',
        '3d_etkdgv3_xyz': './qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornane_conf0.xyz',
        '3d_etkdg_sdf': './qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornane_conf0.sdf',
        '3d_etkdg_xyz': './qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornane_conf0.xyz'
    },
    'norbornene': {
        '2d': './qc_assets/2d/norbornene.png',
        '3d_etkdgv3_sdf': './qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornene_conf0.sdf',
        '3d_etkdgv3_xyz': './qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornene_conf0.xyz',
        '3d_etkdg_sdf': './qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornene_conf0.sdf',
        '3d_etkdg_xyz': './qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornene_conf0.xyz'
    },
    'norbornadiene': {
        '2d': './qc_assets/2d/norbornadiene.png',
        '3d_etkdgv3_sdf': './qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornadiene_conf0.sdf',
        '3d_etkdgv3_xyz': './qc_assets/3d/etkdgv3/norbornadiene_conf0.xyz',
        '3d_etkdg_sdf': './qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornadiene_conf0.sdf',
        '3d_etkdg_xyz': './qc_assets/3d/etkdg/norbornadiene_conf0.xyz'
    }
}

# 格式化输出
def format_results(results, qc_assets, ri_avg_diff_percent, ri_avg_within_threshold, RI_avg_final, final_method):
    output = ""

    # (1) 计算并报告三种分子在两方法下的RI（逐分子）及各方法的RI_avg。
    output += "(1) RI and RI_avg:\n"
    for method in ['ETKDGv3', 'ETKDG']:
        output += f"  - {method}:\n"
        for molecule in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']:
            output += f"    • {molecule}: RI={results[method][molecule]['RI']:.2f}\n"
        output += f"    • RI_avg={results[method]['RI_avg']:.2f}\n"

    # (2) 报告单分子能量百分比差与RI百分比差，并标记是否在各自阈值内。
    output += "\n(2) Single Molecule Differences:\n"
    for molecule in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']:
        output += f"  - {molecule}:\n"
        output += f"    • Energy Difference (%): {results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['energy_diff_percent']:.2f}% (Within Threshold: {results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['energy_within_threshold']})\n"
        output += f"    • RI Difference (%): {results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['ri_diff_percent']:.2f}% (Within Threshold: {results['ETKDGv3'][molecule]['ri_within_threshold']})\n"

    # (3) 报告两方法RI_avg的百分比差与阈值判定；据此给出最终RI_avg_final及采用的方法。
    output += "\n(3) RI_avg Comparison:\n"
    output += f"  • RI_avg Difference (%): {ri_avg_diff_percent:.2f}%\n"
    output += f"  • Within Threshold: {ri_avg_within_threshold}\n"
    output += f"  • Final RI_avg: {RI_avg_final:.2f} (Method: {final_method})\n"

    # (4) 提供质检用文件路径（字符串）：
    output += "\n(4) Quality Check Assets:\n"
    for molecule in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']:
        output += f"  - {molecule}:\n"
        for asset_type, asset_path in qc_assets[molecule].items():
            output += f"    • {asset_type}: {asset_path}\n"

    return output

# 调用格式化输出函数
output = format_results(results, qc_assets, ri_avg_diff_percent, ri_avg_within_threshold, RI_avg_final, final_method)

# 打印最终结果
print(output)

# 结果汇总（数值表达，保留两位小数）：
# (1)
df_ri = pd.DataFrame(index=['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene', 'RI_avg'])
df_ri['ETKDGv3'] = [round(results['ETKDGv3'][mol]['RI'], 2) for mol in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']] + [round(results['ETKDGv3']['RI_avg'], 2)]
df_ri['ETKDG'] = [round(results['ETKDG'][mol]['RI'], 2) for mol in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']] + [round(results['ETKDG']['RI_avg'], 2)]
print("(1) RI Values:\n", df_ri)

# (2)
df_diff = pd.DataFrame(index=['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene'])
df_diff['Energy_Diff(%)'] = [round(results['ETKDGv3'][mol]['energy_diff_percent'], 2) for mol in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']]
df_diff['Energy_Within_Thresh'] = [results['ETKDGv3'][mol]['energy_within_threshold'] for mol in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']]
df_diff['RI_Diff(%)'] = [round(results['ETKDGv3'][mol]['ri_diff_percent'], 2) for mol in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']]
df_diff['RI_Within_Thresh'] = [results['ETKDGv3'][mol]['ri_within_threshold'] for mol in ['norbornane', 'norbornene', 'norbornadiene']]
print("\n(2) Difference Values:\n", df_diff)

# (3)
print(f"\n(3) RI_avg Difference (%): {round(ri_avg_diff_percent, 2)}%")
print(f"Within Threshold: {ri_avg_within_threshold}")
print(f"Final RI_avg: {round(RI_avg_final, 2)} (Method: {final_method})")

# (4) 输出(4)质检文件路径，不再重复。

```

**总结:**

(1)  **RI值:**  分别计算了ETKDGv3和ETKDG两种方法下，norbornane, norbornene, norbornadiene三种分子的RI值，以及两种方法的平均RI值(RI_avg)。  所有数值均保留两位小数。

(2)  **单分子差异:**  计算了ETKDGv3和ETKDG方法之间，单个分子的能量百分比差异和RI百分比差异。  同时，判断了这些差异是否在预设的阈值(能量2.0%, RI 5.0%)内。

(3)  **方法平均值比较:**  计算了两种方法(ETKDGv3和ETKDG)的RI_avg的百分比差异，并判断该差异是否在阈值(5.0%)内。  根据判断结果，确定了最终的RI_avg值和选择的方法(此处为ETKDGv3，因为差异在阈值内)。

(4)  **质检文件路径:**  提供了三种分子在各个步骤中产生的相关文件路径，用于质量检查。

metadata.subject: 化学科学
solution_steps: 定义三种[2.2.1]双环体系的SMILES结构：norbornane (C1CC2CCC1C2), norbornene (C1CC2C=CC1C2), norbornadiene (C1=CC2C=CC1C2)
调用 chem_visualizer 生成三个分子的2D和3D可视化图像
对每个分子调用 optimize_geometry(smiles, method='ETKDGv3', force_field='MMFF', max_iters=200) 进行能量优化
对每个分子调用 get_3d_properties(smiles, method='ETKDGv3', conf_id=0) 计算3D性质
提取 Rg, PMI1, PMI3, eccentricity，计算刚性指数 RI = (1/Rg) × (PMI1/PMI3) × (1 + eccentricity) × 100
获取三个分子的RI：norbornane=81.58, norbornene=81.39, norbornadiene=84.50
